blog.name: acepalindrome
blog.title: you're going to be something extraordinary
blog.description: Hello, this is Palindrome! I'm currently doing my best to pretend that I'm a functional and well adjusted adult, with varying levels of success! Around this neck of the woods you'll find history stuff, nature stuff, whatever fandoms I'm into at the moment, fanfics I write when I can muster up the energy, the occasional mental breakdown and a variety of fun facts I come across or things I find interesting. Feel free to follow or drop me a line, I promise I'm quite tame.

summary: I suddenly remember that Fjord was still in real bad shape at the end of the last episode with his max hp being lowered so much,...
body: I suddenly remember that Fjord was still in real bad shape at the end of the last episode with his max hp being lowered so much, and now they’ve got a zombie giant on their plate and possibly more of the Gary Busey monsters, and I got kind of worried but then I remembered that both the clerics like Fjord a lot and also have diamonds, so it’s all gonna turn out okay, right? …right?

reblog.comment: I suddenly remember that Fjord was still in real bad shape at the end of the last episode with his max hp being lowered so much, and now they’ve got a zombie giant on their plate and possibly more of the Gary Busey monsters, and I got kind of worried but then I remembered that both the clerics like Fjord a lot and also have diamonds, so it’s all gonna turn out okay, right? …right?

summary: So this definitely happened at some point
title: So this definitely happened at some point
body:
Random Townswoman: Stay away from me, you Cad.

The Mighty Nein, watching, slow to react: But I was so caught up in the euphoria of [KNOWING CADUCEUS] for like a minute I lived in a world where [USING CAD AS AN INSULT] didn’t exist

tags: BOTH FIND EACH OTHER AND ARE PLATONIC SOUL MATES
summary: Okay if Caleb and his old school friends trio are reincarnated from the Beacon....This is a profound level of literary irony on...
body:
Okay if Caleb and his old school friends trio are reincarnated from the Beacon….This is a profound level of literary irony on so many accounts, but also because of Caleb and Nott’s relationship:

A child of the Empire transformed and reborn as one of its primary enemies: a goblin.

And a child of the Dynasty, a monster to the empire, transformed and reborn as one of its favorite tools: a human mage

reblog.comment:
Okay if Caleb and his old school friends trio are reincarnated from the Beacon….This is a profound level of literary irony on so many accounts, but also because of Caleb and Nott’s relationship:

A child of the Empire transformed and reborn as one of its primary enemies: a goblin.

And a child of the Dynasty, a monster to the empire, transformed and reborn as one of its favorite tools: a human mage

Okay if Caleb and his old school friends trio are reincarnated from the Beacon….This is a profound level of literary irony on so many accounts, but also because of Caleb and Nott’s relationship:

And a child of the Dynasty, a monster to the empire, transformed and reborn as one of its favorite tools: a human mage

Okay if Caleb and his old school friends trio are reincarnated from the Beacon….This is a profound level of literary irony on so many accounts, but also because of Caleb and Nott’s relationship:
